You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesD D] > &dstrok;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Dstrok;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0110/index.htm U+00110].
  * `&dstrok;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0111/index.htm U+00111].
